an4.7:1.1: “Mendicants, these four who are competent, educated, assured, and learned, who have memorized the teachings and practice in line with the teaching, grace the Saṅgha.
an4.7:1.7: These four who are competent, educated, assured, and learned, who have memorized the teachings and practice in line with the teaching, grace the Saṅgha.
an4.7:2.2: learned, a memorizer of the teachings,
an4.7:2.3: who lives in line with the teaching—
an4.7:2.4: such a one is said to grace the Saṅgha.
an4.7:3.6: they are the graces of the Saṅgha.”
